comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/H%C3%A9l%C3%A8ne_Dutrieu Hélène Dutrieu (10 July 1877 – 26 June 1961), was a cycling world champion, stunt cyclist, stunt motorcyclist, automobile racer, stunt driver, pioneer aviator, wartime ambulance driver, and director of a military hospital.
